title: Particle motion - find value of velocity ata point

content.question: A particle moves along the x-axis so that at time <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>t</mi> <mo>â‰¥</mo> <mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8qacaWG0bGaeyyzImRaaGimaaaa@398D@</annotation> </semantics> </math> its position is given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mi>cos</mi> <msqrt> <mi>t</mi> </msqrt> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E6F@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. What is the velocity of the particle at the first instance the particle is at the origin?
